name: .2SFLIB File Extension
summary: Learn about .2SFLIB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by some Nintendo DS games; saves sound information used for playing audio during the game; referenced by .MINI2SF files, which point to the parts of the library to play during the game.

content: MINI2SF files with their corresponding 2SFLIB file can be played using Winamp with the vio2sf plug-in.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
